question_text:
Question 7
1. 
Some football players play cricket
2. 
All cricket players play hockey
Among the options given below, the statement that logically follows from the two statements 1 and 2 
above, is :
(A) All football players play hockey  
(B) Some football players play hockey
(C) No football player plays hockey 
(D) All hockey players play football
explanation_text:
Sol.
Hockey
Football
Cricket
Hence, the correct option is (B).
